epc.spec
Class ECTrigger

java.lang.Object
  epc.spec.ECTrigger

public class ECTrigger
extends java.lang.Object

ECTrigger denotes a URI that is used to specify a start or stop trigger for an event cycle or command cycle. The interpretation of this URI is determined by the ALE implementation; the kinds and means of triggers supported is intended to be a point of extensibility.

Field Detail

triggerURI

private java.lang.String triggerURI
Trigger URI. Using the following syntax :
 urn:epcglobal:ale:trigger:'triggerType':'triggerData'
with :
   _______________________________________________________________________ 
  |              |                   |                                    |
  | 'triggerType'|   'triggerData'   |       Description                  |
  |______________|___________________|____________________________________|
  | "tag"        | "'SGLN_code'"     | SGLN code for triggering tags scan |
  |______________|___________________|____________________________________|
  | "pause"      | N/A               | PAUSE assertion/de-assertion IHM   |
  |              |                   | event (toggle)                     |
  |______________|___________________|____________________________________|
  | "end"        | N/A               | END assertion IHM event            |
  |______________|___________________|____________________________________|
  | "threshold"  | "'VAL'"           | Maximum number of tags to scan in  |
  |              |                   | an event cycle (long)              |
  |______________|___________________|____________________________________|
